title: Novel Fe/Ca oxide co-embedded coconut shell biochar for phosphorus recovery from agricultural return flows
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27204-27214
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04795H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Anqi Hu, Yongcan Jiang, Jiaqi An, Xiaodian Huang, Abdelbaky Hossam Elgarhy, Huafen Cao, Guanglong Liu
A Fe/Ca oxide co-embedded biochar (FCBC) was prepared by FeCl2 and CaO2 as precursors. FCBC had excellent phosphorus adsorption properties under alkaline conditions. FCBC recovered over 94% of phosphorus from agricultural return flows.
